points: Description of points field. {0} is the number of points; {1} is the highscore.
highscore: Description of highscore embed. {0} is the new highscore.
won: Description of game-done embed for a winner. {0} is the number of points; {1} is the tile size required to win.
lost: Description of game-done embed for a loser. {0} is the number of points.
